channel.title: leyden on JavaIsland
channel.description: Recent content in leyden on JavaIsland

item.title: Java introduces static images to solve problems like slow running
item.description: In a recent social media post, Mark Reinhold, Chief Architect of Oracle’s Java Platform Group, officially announced the launch of the “Leyden” project. The project is said to have been approved and will alleviate slow startup and performance issues by introducing “static images” on the Java platform, designed to accelerate the creation of Java businesses. It is understood that the “Leyden” project was first proposed around May 2020 and has been discussed for more than 2 years now.
